issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
When the property {{mapreduce.job.log4j-properties-file}} is set a local filesystem is created even if it's never used:
https://github.com/apache/hadoop/blob/trunk/hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-core/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/mapreduce/JobResourceUploader.java#L858-L866

The localFS should only be created when required.
fields.summary: JobResourceUploader creates LocalFileSystem when it's not necessary

comments.body: Seems to be reasonable. Can't see any risk. Let's wait for the jenkins results..
